description:
Furugoori Minami is Kona`s mother.
She was the one in charge of the production of the Gunvarrel anime. When her brainwashing wore off and she realized that the anime contained subliminal messages, her brainwashed co-workers were ordered to kill her. Whether she is dead is yet unknown, but she has been missing ever since.
name: Furugoori Minami
